metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0296 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Race condition in pigz before 2.2.5 uses permissions derived from the umask when compressing a file before setting that file's permissions to match those of the original file, which might allow local users to bypass intended access permissions while compression is occurring.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0296` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pigz - 2.3.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pigz package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-2').
